Title: Susan Hargrave (No. 18)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Vincent Angell (teleplay by), Daniel Cerone (teleplay by), Brian Studler (teleplay by), J.R. Orci (story by), Lukas Reiter (story by), Brandon Margolis (executive story editor), Brandon Sonnier (executive story editor), Brian Studler (executive story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: When Reddington links an elegant, powerful and extremely dangerous Romanian woman to the recent tragic events, the task force is forced to play a deadly cat and mouse game to stop her before she strikes again.
